Tints & Tones

These colors are lighter and darker variations of our main brand colors. These are especially helpful for hover states, illustrations, and other small variations.

Typography

is used as our primary typeface and is used as an accent for headings and other special purposes.

Aa Aa Aa Aa Aa Aa

Aa Aa Aa Aa Aa Aa

Headings

p

By Jove, my quick study of lexicography won a prize! Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard. Grumpy wizards make a toxic brew for the jovial queen. A quick movement of the enemy will jeopardize six gunboats. Jackie will budget for the most expensive zoology equipment. Jim quickly realized that the beautiful gowns are expensive, then a cop quizzed Mick Jagger’s ex-wives briefly.

h1

The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog

h2

h3

The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog

h4

The quick brown fox jumps over a lazy dog

h5

    By Jove, my quick study of lexicography won a prize! Painful zombies quickly watch a jinxed graveyard. Grumpy wizards make a toxic brew for the jovial queen.
